analysis.description:
ERC721 (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol#235-253) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol#245-247)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol#247-250)

ERC721Token (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol#256-468) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol#332-335)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol#344-353)

Reentrancy in CryptoSagaCardSwapVer1.swapCardForReward (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol#1353-1388):
	External calls:
	- _numberOfClasses = heroContract.numberOfHeroClasses() (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol)
	- heroContract.mint(tx.origin,_candidates[random(_count,0)]) (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- seed (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol)

Reentrancy in CryptoSagaHero.withdrawDeposit (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol#1250-1264):
	External calls:
	- goldContract.transfer(msg.sender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol#1258-1264)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- addressToGoldDeposit (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol#1260-1263)
_ivForStats in CryptoSagaHero.mint (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol#1088-1089) is a local variable never initialiazed

CryptoSagaCardSwapVer1.swapCardForReward has external calls inside a loop:
	- heroContract.getClassRank(i) == _heroRankToMint && blackList[i] != true (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol)

Reentrancy in CryptoSagaHero.transferDeposit (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol#1236-1249):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(goldContract.allowance(msg.sender,this) >= _amount) (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol#1236-1240)
	- goldContract.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_amount) (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol#1243-1249)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- addressToGoldDeposit (/unique_chucks/23/0x30ed9d2a07f4a79557c8e75ad4d95071a18af0bc.sol#1245-1249)
